Thank you for installing, before you use Negative, This will teach you and turn to a beginner. Good luck using Negative!

How to Use:

n.exit* - exits program
sign - displays text
setinput - displays a input
if - displays/controls the block of code
elseif* - makes a block like else*
else* - makes a block of code
define - defines a variable name or value.

What is SysHalt?
SysHalt is a error detection when a error has occurred. It detects incorrect statements, It halts programs
when had errors.
